title: The low dimensional homology groups of the elementary group of rank two
authors: Behrooz Mirzaii and Elvis Torres P\'erez
abstract:
In this article we study the first, the second and the third homology groups
of the elementary group $\textrm{E}_2(A)$, where $A$ is a commutative ring. In
particular, we prove a refined Bloch-Wigner type exact sequence over a
semilocal ring (with some mild restriction on its residue fields) such that
$-1\in (A^{\times})^2$ or $|A^{\times}/(A^{\times})^2|\leq 4$.
